verses.verse: וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei Now the sons רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben בְּכֽוֹר־ <S%H1060><s%> be-chor- the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הַבְּכוֹר֒ <S%H1060><s%> hab-be-chOr (for he [was] the firstborn וּֽבְחַלְּלוֹ֙ <S%H2490><s%> u-ve-chal-le-Lo but forasmuch as he defiled יְצוּעֵ֣י <S%H3326><s%> ye-tzu-'Ei bed אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, his father's נִתְּנָה֙ <S%H5414><s%> nit-te-Nah was given בְּכֹ֣רָת֔וֹ <S%H1062><s%> be-Cho-ra-To, his birthright לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei unto the sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef of Joseph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo is not לְהִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <S%H3187><s%> le-hit-ya-Ches and the genealogy is not to be reckoned לַבְּכֹרָֽה׃ <S%H1062><s%> lab-be-cho-Rah. after the birthright

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki Though יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah For Judah גָּבַ֣ר <S%H1396><s%> ga-Var prevailed בְּאֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> be-'e-Chav, above his brethren וּלְנָגִ֖יד <S%H5057><s%> u-le-na-Gid and of him [came] the chief ruler מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; yet וְהַבְּכֹרָ֖ה <S%H1062><s%> ve-hab-be-cho-Rah but the birthright לְיוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> le-yo-Sef. Joseph ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven [I say] of Reuben בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel חֲנ֥וֹךְ <S%H2585><s%> cha-Noch [were] Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <S%H6396><s%> u-fal-Lu and Pallu חֶצְר֥וֹן <S%H2696><s%> chetz-Ron Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <S%H3756><s%> ve-char-Mi. and Carmi

בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יוֹאֵ֑ל <S%H3100><s%> yo-'El; of Joel שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah Shemaiah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son גּ֥וֹג <S%H1463><s%> Gog Gog בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <S%H8096><s%> shim-'I Shimei בְנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No. his son

מִיכָ֥ה <S%H4318><s%> mi-Chah Micah בְנ֛וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son רְאָיָ֥ה <S%H7211><s%> re-'a-Yah Reaia בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No his son בַּ֥עַל <S%H1168><s%> Ba-'al Baal בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son

בְּאֵרָ֣ה <S%H880><s%> be-'e-Rah Beerah בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No, his son אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הֶגְלָ֔ה <S%H1540><s%> heg-Lah, carried away תִּלְּגַ֥ת til-le-Gat פִּלְנְאֶ֖סֶר <S%H8407><s%> pil-ne-'E-ser whom Tilgathpilneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king אַשֻּׁ֑ר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur; of Assyria ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he נָשִׂ֖יא <S%H5387><s%> na-Si [captive] he [was] prince לָרֽאוּבֵנִֽי׃ <S%H7206><s%> lo-R-'u-ve-Ni. of the Reubenites

וְאֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav And his brethren לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔יו <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tav, by their families בְּהִתְיַחֵ֖שׂ <S%H3187><s%> be-hit-ya-Ches was reckoned לְתֹלְדוֹתָ֑ם <S%H8435><s%> le-to-le-do-Tam; of their generations הָרֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh [were] the chief יְעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3273><s%> ye-'i-'El Jeiel וּזְכַרְיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H2148><s%> u-ze-char-Ya-hu. and Zechariah

וּבֶ֙לַע֙ <S%H1106><s%> u-Ve-la' And Bela בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עָזָ֔ז <S%H5811><s%> 'a-Zaz, of Azaz בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שֶׁ֖מַע <S%H8087><s%> She-ma' of Shema בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹאֵ֑ל <S%H3100><s%> yo-'El; of Joel ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu who יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev who dwelt בַּעֲרֹעֵ֔ר <S%H6177><s%> ba-'a-ro-'Er, in Aroer וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- even נְב֖וֹ <S%H5015><s%> ne-Vo even unto Nebo וּבַ֥עַל u-Va-'al מְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1186><s%> me-'on. and Baalmeon

וְלַמִּזְרָ֗ח <S%H4217><s%> ve-lam-miz-Rach, And eastward יָשַׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav he inhabited עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far לְב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> le-Vo unto the entering מִדְבָּ֔רָה <S%H4057><s%> mid-Ba-rah, in of the wilderness לְמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> le-min- from הַנָּהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har from the river פְּרָ֑ת <S%H6578><s%> pe-Rat; Euphrates כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ki because מִקְנֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H4735><s%> mik-nei-Hem because their cattle רָב֖וּ <S%H7235><s%> ra-Vu were multiplied בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad. of Gilead

וּבִימֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> u-vi-Mei And in the days שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, of Saul עָשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su they made מִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah war עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַֽהַגְרִאִ֔ים <S%H1905><s%> ha-hag-ri-'Im, with the Hagarites וַֽיִּפְּל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-pe-Lu who fell בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Dam; by their hand וַיֵּשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu and they dwelt בְּאָ֣הֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H168><s%> be-'O-ho-lei-Hem, in their tents עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- throughout כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei throughout מִזְרָ֥ח <S%H4217><s%> miz-Rach all the east לַגִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> lag-gil-'Ad. [land] of Gilead פ Peh

וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-nei- And the children גָ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> gad of Gad לְנֶגְדָּ֗ם <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Dam, opposite יָֽשְׁב֛וּ <S%H3427><s%> ya-she-Vu dwelt בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz over against them in the land הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> hab-ba-Shan of Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far סַלְכָֽה׃ <S%H5548><s%> sal-Chah. unto Salchah

יוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> yo-'El Joel הָרֹ֔אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> ha-Rosh, the chief וְשָׁפָ֖ם <S%H8223><s%> ve-sha-Fam and Shapham הַמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <S%H4932><s%> ham-mish-Neh; the next וְיַעְנַ֥י <S%H3285><s%> ve-ya'-Nai and Jaanai וְשָׁפָ֖ט <S%H8202><s%> ve-sha-Fat and Shaphat בַּבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan. in Bashan

וַאֲחֵיהֶ֞ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem And their brethren לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house אֲבוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Hem, of their fathers מִֽיכָאֵ֡ל <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El [were] Michael וּמְשֻׁלָּ֡ם <S%H4918><s%> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam וְ֠שֶׁבַע <S%H7652><s%> Ve-she-va' and Sheba וְיוֹרַ֧י <S%H3140><s%> ve-yo-Rai and Jorai וְיַעְכָּ֛ן <S%H3275><s%> ve-ya'-Kan and Jachan וְזִ֥יעַ <S%H2127><s%> ve-Zi-a' and Zia וָעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5677><s%> va-'E-ver and Heber שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah. seven ס sa-Mek

אֵ֣לֶּה׀ <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei These [are] the children אֲבִיחַ֗יִל <S%H32><s%> 'a-vi-Cha-yil, of Abihail בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חוּרִ֡י <S%H2359><s%> chu-Ri of Huri בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יָ֠רוֹחַ <S%H3386><s%> Ya-ro-ach of Jaroah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גִּלְעָ֧ד <S%H1568><s%> gil-'Ad of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מִיכָאֵ֛ל <S%H4317><s%> mi-cha-'El of Michael בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְשִׁישַׁ֥י <S%H3454><s%> ye-shi-Shai of Jeshishai בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יַחְדּ֖וֹ <S%H3163><s%> yach-Do of Jahdo בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בּֽוּז׃ <S%H938><s%> Buz. of Buz

אֲחִי֙ <S%H277><s%> 'a-Chi Ahi בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַבְדִּיאֵ֣ל <S%H5661><s%> 'av-di-'El of Abdiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גּוּנִ֔י <S%H1476><s%> gu-Ni, of Guni רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh chief לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit of the house אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam. of their fathers

וַיֵּֽשְׁב֛וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu And they dwelt בַּגִּלְעָ֥ד <S%H1568><s%> bag-gil-'Ad in Gilead בַּבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> bab-ba-Shan in Bashan וּבִבְנֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-viv-no-Tei-ha; and in her towns וּבְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all מִגְרְשֵׁ֥י <S%H4054><s%> mig-re-Shei and in all the suburbs שָׁר֖וֹן <S%H8289><s%> sha-Ron of Sharon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- far תּוֹצְאוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H8444><s%> totz-'o-Tam. upon their borders

כֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam All הִתְיַחְשׂ֔וּ <S%H3187><s%> hit-yach-Su, All these were reckoned by genealogies בִּימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days יוֹתָ֣ם <S%H3147><s%> yo-Tam of Jotham מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah; of Judah וּבִימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> u-vi-Mei and in the days יָרָבְעָ֥ם <S%H3379><s%> ya-ra-ve-'Am of Jeroboam מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- The sons רְאוּבֵ֨ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben וְגָדִ֜י <S%H1425><s%> ve-ga-Di and the Gadites וַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> va-cha-Tzi and half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <S%H7626><s%> she-vet- the tribe מְנַשֶּׁה֮ <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh of Manasseh מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- afflicted חַיִל֒ <S%H2428><s%> cha-Yil of valiant men אֲ֠נָשִׁים <S%H582><s%> 'A-na-shim men נֹשְׂאֵ֨י <S%H5375><s%> no-se-'Ei able to bear מָגֵ֤ן <S%H4043><s%> ma-Gen buckler וְחֶ֙רֶב֙ <S%H2719><s%> ve-Che-rev and sword וְדֹ֣רְכֵי <S%H1869><s%> ve-Do-re-chei and to shoot קֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> Ke-shet, with bow וּלְמוּדֵ֖י <S%H3925><s%> u-le-mu-Dei and skilful מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah; in war אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im and forty וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah [were] four אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> u-she-va'- seven מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred וְשִׁשִּׁ֖ים <S%H8346><s%> ve-shish-Shim and threescore יֹצְאֵ֥י <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Ei that went out צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va. to the war

וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su And they made מִלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah war עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- against הַֽהַגְרִיאִ֑ים <S%H1905><s%> ha-hag-ri-'Im; with the Hagarites וִיט֥וּר <S%H3195><s%> vi-Tur with Jetur וְנָפִ֖ישׁ <S%H5305><s%> ve-na-Fish and Nephish וְנוֹדָֽב׃ <S%H5114><s%> ve-no-Dav. and Nodab

וַיֵּעָזְר֣וּ <S%H5826><s%> vai-ye-'a-ze-Ru And they were helped עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, against וַיִּנָּתְנ֤וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yin-na-te-Nu were delivered בְיָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Dam into their hand הַֽהַגְרִיאִ֔ים <S%H1905><s%> ha-hag-ri-'Im, against them and the Hagarites וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all שֶׁ֣עִמָּהֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> she-'im-ma-Hem; with כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֵאלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him to God זָעֲקוּ֙ <S%H2199><s%> za-'a-Ku and all that [were] with them for they cried בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> bam-mil-cha-Mah, in the battle וְנַעְתּ֥וֹר <S%H6279><s%> ve-na'-Tor and he was intreated לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because בָ֥טְחוּ <S%H982><s%> Va-te-chu of them because they put their trust בֽוֹ׃ vo.

וַיִּשְׁבּ֣וּ <S%H7617><s%> vai-yish-Bu And they took away מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H4735><s%> mik-nei-Hem, their cattle גְּֽמַלֵּיהֶ֞ם <S%H1581><s%> ge-mal-lei-Hem of their camels חֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <S%H2572><s%> cha-mish-Shim fifty אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> 'e-lef thousand וְצֹ֗אן <S%H6629><s%> ve-Tzon, and of sheep מָאתַ֤יִם <S%H3967><s%> ma-Ta-yim two hundred וַחֲמִשִּׁים֙ <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim and fifty אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef, thousand וַחֲמוֹרִ֖ים <S%H2543><s%> va-cha-mo-Rim and of asses אַלְפָּ֑יִם <S%H505><s%> 'al-Pa-yim; two thousand וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ve-Ne-fesh any אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam man מֵ֥אָה <S%H3967><s%> Me-'ah an hundred אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> 'A-lef. thousand

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because חֲלָלִ֤ים <S%H2491><s%> cha-la-Lim slain רַבִּים֙ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim down many נָפָ֔לוּ <S%H5307><s%> na-Fa-lu, For there fell כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because מֵהָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> me-ha-'E-lo-Him [was] of God הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah; because the war וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> vai-ye-she-Vu And they dwelt תַחְתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H8478><s%> tach-tei-Hem their place עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הַגֹּלָֽה׃ <S%H1473><s%> hag-go-Lah. in their steads until the captivity פ Peh
